verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1471>pass<s%>, when all the nation were <S%H8552>clean<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Take <S%H3947><s%> you <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> out of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, out of <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>,

and <S%H6680>command<s%> ye <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, <S%H5375>Take<s%> you hence out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, out of the place where the <S%H3548>priests<s%>' <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H4673>stood<s%> <S%H3559>firm<s%>, <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, and carry them <S%H5674>over<s%> with <S%H3240>you<s%>, and lay them down in the <S%H4411>lodging-place<s%>, where ye shall <S%H3885>lodge<s%> this <S%H3915>night<s%>.

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>, whom he had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, out of <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>:

and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5674>them<s%>, Pass over <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and take you <S%H7311>up<s%> <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of you a <S%H68>stone<s%> upon his <S%H7926>shoulder<s%>, according unto the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

that this may be a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H1121>you<s%>, that, when your children <S%H7592>ask<s%> in time to <S%H4279>come<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What mean ye by these <S%H68>stones<s%>?

then ye shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H4325>them<s%>, Because the waters of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> were cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; when it passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> were cut <S%H3772>off<s%>: and these <S%H68>stones<s%> shall be for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so as <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, and took <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and they carried them <S%H5674>over<s%> with them unto the place where they <S%H4411>lodged<s%>, and laid them down <S%H3240>there<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> set <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, in the place where the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H4673>stood<s%>: and they are there unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

For the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, until <S%H1697>everything<s%> was <S%H8552>finished<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, according to all that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4116>hasted<s%> and passed <S%H5674>over<s%>.

And it came to <S%H5971>pass<s%>, when all the people were <S%H8552>clean<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%>, that the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and the <S%H2677>half<s%> - <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2571>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> spake unto <S%H1696>them<s%>:

about <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2502>ready<s%> armed for <S%H6635>war<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto <S%H4421>battle<s%>, to the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>.

On that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1431>magnified<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and they <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3372>him<s%>, as they feared <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Command <S%H6680><s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, that they come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.
60 <S%H3091><s%> therefore <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Come ye <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3548>pass<s%>, when the priests that <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> were come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>' <S%H7272>feet<s%> were lifted <S%H5423>up<s%> unto the dry <S%H2724>ground<s%>, that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto their <S%H4725>place<s%>, and went <S%H3212>over<s%> all its <S%H1415>banks<s%>, <S%H8543>as<s%> <S%H8032>aforetime<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, on the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H7097>border<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>.
And those <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, which they took <S%H3947>out<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, did <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6965>set<s%> up in <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>.

And he <S%H559>spake<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, When your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H7592>ask<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> in time to <S%H4279>come<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What mean these <S%H68>stones<s%>?
Then ye shall let your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> on dry <S%H3004>land<s%>.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> dried <S%H3001>up<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5674>you<s%>, until ye were passed over, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>, which he dried <S%H3001>up<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5674>us<s%>, until we were passed over;

that all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that it is <S%H2389>mighty<s%>; that ye may <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H3117>ever<s%>.
